title: [Self-Directed] IoT-Based Competency Enhancement Program for Adult Educators

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy (smartphone proficiency) and secondary education experience
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen mathematics education competencies for corporate educators (leaders/managers) using IoT technology. Implements MOOC-based blended learning in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: They can explain the fundamental principles of IoT technology and its educational applications.
They can design IoT-based math projects utilizing OER materials provided by MOOC platforms.
They can develop real-life problem-solving math education content by analyzing IoT sensor data in smartphone environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
